title: I live in the 41st St/Shipyard Blvd area and quite often hear train whistles especially during the early morning hours even though the nearest train tracks that i am aware of are way over on Coval St. The whistles sound very close. Where do these trains go? The Port?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using
MyReporter.com and thanks for your patience!
